A ping module for asyncio.


Installation
------------
Use pip_ like::

    $ pip install asyncping

.. _pip:  https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pip


Usage
-----

.. code:: python

    import asyncio
    from asyncping import ping

    loop = asyncio.get_event_loop()
    result = loop.run_until_complete(ping('127.0.0.1'))
    print(result)
